question.text:
Which of the following best characterises paragraph 9 ?
A It advises instructors to refrain from applying 'grit-building' methods too often.
B It lists the reasons for subjecting children to 'grit-building' tactics.
C It makes clear why 'building grit' is the preferred strategy of many a politician.
D It warns how 'building grit' can squeeze out independent thinking.
